title: We the Lord Lieutenant and Council being informed, that both at the assizes and sessions held in several countyes of this kingdom, divers summes of mony have been of late years l[...]ned under pretence of presentments from the grand jury ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council of Ireland, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
